name: Time Wizard (3AMGames)
description:
Made for Quad Jam 3!

CONTROLS: 

A/D to move, or arrow keys

W or Space to jump and open doors

NOTE: Completing World 1 unlocks Worlds 2 and 3, which can be completed in either order.

Most sound fx were not made by me, they were purchased via splice.com

KNOWN BUGS:

- Sometimes in World 3 you will get stuck on the Top Hat. I am very sorry, I didn't have time to figure it out.
